summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackMaybelline New York's Lifter Gloss with hyaluronic acid delivers glossy lips and a full look. Drench lips with hydrating shine for a lifted look.
details: DetailsBenefitsFuller Lips; Lasting HydrationLip gloss visibly smooths and hydrates lipsXL Wand enhances lip contour90 percent agree lips feel hydrated, in a consumer testItem 2566243How To UseStep 1. Apply lip gloss with the XL wand applicator in the centre of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth. Step 2. Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip.IngredientsC18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polybutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Saccharin, Sorbic Acid, Alumina, Silica, Polybutylene Terephthalate, Trihydroxystearin, Cocos Nucifera Oil/Coconut Oil, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ethylene/Va Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol, Magnesium Silicate, Glucomannan, Parfum/Fragrance. May Contain: CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499/Iron Oxides, Mica, CI 45410/Red 28 Lake, CI 15850/Red 7, CI 75470/Carmine, CI 15850/Red 6, CI 17200/Red 33 Lake, CI 45380/Red 22 Lake, CI 15985/Yellow 6 Lake, CI 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090/Blue 1 Lake. F.I.L. D243599/2.
how_to_use: Step 1. Apply lip gloss with the XL wand applicator in the centre of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth. Step 2. Glide the lip gloss across the entire bottom lip.

reviews.headline: Great formula for the price!
reviews.comments: I got influenced to buy this shade. The formula is great but the shade was just a little too pink for my skin tone. The price is also great compared to other brands!

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: This lipgloss goes on smooth, lasts about an hour and looks beautiful! The price isn't bad either :)

reviews.headline: I Would buy again. Possible different color
reviews.comments: Great shine.  Not sticky or tooo thick.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: Like that it is sheer and not sticky. Although shape of container makes it easy to find in your purse, getting the top and bottom to line up when closing it, is not foolproof with this shape.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Love it

reviews.headline: New favorite gloss
reviews.comments: This is probably one of the best glosses I've tried in a whileâ€” not sticky, hydrating, and I love that they have more pigmented shades. I  got Silk, one of the high pigment colors, and it is beautiful on fair olive skin! I was also really impressed that it didn't settle into lip lines.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again!
reviews.comments: This is a great dupe for the fenty beauty gloss in this shade, and it looks really pretty on the lips. I honestly love most maybelline glosses, but this one i"ve been reaching for the most even over elf the elf lip oils which used to be my favorite!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This lifter glossy lasts even longer than I expected! I'm definitely buying it again

reviews.headline: No different than any other gloss
reviews.comments: This Lip gloss does nothing to plump your lips at all. It also feels very tacky on your lips.

reviews.headline: Theres better glosses.
reviews.comments: I bought two today and the colors are very pretty but it's not worth the hype. The taste is so gross.. it taste like chemicals and things that I can't even describe. When your apply only a little bit comes out so you have to keep dipping it to put more on your lip. Applicator is ok. wish it were a bit bigger. Overall it's mid wouldn't recommend.

reviews.headline: loved it
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Packaging  is lovely! Smells good and it gives my lips a little plump! Would definitely  
buy again! My first one my sister bought it for me and loved that one too ! Price is great

reviews.headline: "Sun" color Lifter Gloss
reviews.comments: There was a sale on this Lifter line for National Lipstick Day. I had purchased the color "Raspberry" in the past and I felt it was a good value for the product. This shade "Sun" is very pretty, very shiny, glossy with a mostly clear-golden shimmery look and just a very subtle champagne sheen base to it. So pretty. I like my glosses subtle and light but can you can build upon this the color with multiple layers.

reviews.headline: Lip gloss makes smooth
reviews.comments: I really liked this lipgloss because of the Hyaluronic acid.  It makes my lips smooth and maybe even a little plump

reviews.headline: Beautiful Gloss
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Such a beautiful gloss! Smells delicious and the packaging has a quality feel to it. I would purchase this lip gloss and gift them to my friends especially with the doe foot applicator.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: This gloss is so glossy and smell like a chocolate, the packaging it's easy to take and the price it's so good because worth it. The texture it's glossy.

reviews.headline: So pretty!!
reviews.comments: I was sent this product for free in exchange for my honest review. And the new is...I love it!! I actually lost mine because it goes everywhere with me and bow I've misplaced it, I'm so sad. But I'll be ordering a few more in other colors.

reviews.headline: It's just ok.
reviews.comments: This has a pretty color that stays for a bit after eating or drinking, but it's the kind of sticky that makes your lips a magnet for the slightest breeze causing your hair to get blown and clumped into the lipgloss. It's not the kind of high quality lipgloss that an adult would want to buy for daily use, just for when you're running quick errands.

reviews.headline: Must Have ðŸ”¥
reviews.comments: Bought this on a whim and so glad I did because its so good! It's similar to Huda Beauty's Faux Filler gloss with a much more reasonable price. Beautiful pigment and feels hydrating without the tacky feel of most gloss. I purchased Stone, looks very close to Foxy from HB, and will be getting the other colors!

reviews.headline: Lovely lip gloss
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I was so curious to try this gloss just by looking at the packaging... It is so cute! And it didn't disappoint! This gloss is just like butter in your lips! I love the ingredients and the fact that it has hyaluronic acid is awesome, skincare and at the same time a great look to my lips. 
I put it on top of my lipstick and it gave me a very elegant look and just by itself it is very hydrating too. You need to reapply after an hour but it is worth it. I need to try more shades.

reviews.headline: hydrating and comfortable
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Maybelline Lifter Gloss delivers a gorgeous, high-shine finish that instantly makes lips look fuller and smoother. The formula feels hydrating and comfortable. With a great range of flattering shades, it's an affordable choice for a plump, glossy look.

faceoff_positive.comments: So the "try it on" feature sucks. I went based on the model images. I LOVE THIS LIP GLOSS! This is the best lip gloss i have tried! I wanted something natural looking. I got amber (goes good with any skin tone) and i also got crysral for whenever i want sparkly lips (rarely). The feeling of this lip gloss is amazing. Not sticky,  not annoying, and not too heavy. This will now be my forever lip gloss from now on! I LOVE IT!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best lip gloss ever!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so eager to try this product and only Topaz and the dark brown color had a chance of coordinating with my skin tone.  I don't like dark brown lip colors that don't have a touch of red in them so it looks like something that should go on the lips ( I am a big fan of your Super stay 24 lipcolor in Endless Espresso because it is a brown color with a tiny touch of red color) so I tried the Topaz color.  It didn't show up on me and I have caramel-colored skin.  You had a dark-skinned model wear one of these lip colors on your website and it looks clear on her.  I think most women want a color that you can see or they would buy a clear gloss.  I'm upset that in this day and age you would create a new lipgloss without a full range of colors from light to dark that complement a variety of skin tones and show up on darker skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Need more colors for darker skin
